title: Nova doesn't support resize operation for instance booted from volume

comments.content: Nova doesn't support resize operation for instance booted from any volume backend.

comments.content: from the current implementation of resize of libvirt.  when instance flavor is changed, we use qemu-img to change the instance disk size. so it's obvious that instance booted from volume cann't be resized , there is no volume API to extend existed volume  also.
